archimate:Resource.name: Message Transformer
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for transforming messages from one format to the other, including data format transforms into a single “canonical” form or its subset, and transformation across protocols to whatever protocols that are routed. It also supports data enrichment.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for transforming messages from one format to the other, including data format transforms into a single “canonical” form or its subset, and transformation across protocols to whatever protocols that are routed. It also supports data enrichment.
